short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 9GAG is better without loads of GIF and Videos, this extension removes them!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remember the old days when 9GAG didn't have gifs and vids?
Pepperidge Farm Remembers

This extension removes the video and gif post on the popular site 9gag.

Instruction:

To turn on
1. Go to 9gag.com
2. Click on this extension's icon
3. Enjoy picture only 9GAG

To turn off
1. Click icon
2. Click "Pic Only is On!" to turn off
3. Keep scrolling and loading gifs/vids
(Or you can refresh the page)
